00033 IOApplication::IOApplication( const char name[], bool have_input, bool have_output ): Application( name ), m_input( have_input ), m_output( have_output )
00034 {
00035     if ( have_input ) {
00036         parameters["in"] = std::string();
00037         parameters["in"].setDescription( "input file or dataset" );
00038         parameters["rf"] = std::string();
00039         parameters["rf"].needed() = false;
00040         parameters["rf"].hidden() = true;
00041         parameters["rf"].setDescription( "Override automatic detection of file suffix for reading with given value" );
00042         parameters["rdialect"] = std::string();
00043         parameters["rdialect"].needed() = false;
00044         parameters["rdialect"].setDescription(
00045             "choose dialect for reading. The available dialects depend on the capabilities of IO plugins" );
00046     }
00047 
00048     if ( have_output ) {
00049         parameters["out"] = std::string();
00050         parameters["out"].setDescription( "output file" );
00051         parameters["wf"] = std::string();
00052         parameters["wf"].needed() = false;
00053         parameters["wf"].setDescription( "Override automatic detection of file suffix for writing with given value" );
00054         parameters["wf"].hidden() = true;
00055         parameters["wdialect"] = std::string();
00056         parameters["wdialect"].needed() = false;
00057         parameters["wdialect"].setDescription( "choose dialect for writing. The available dialects depend on the capabilities of IO plugins" );
00058         std::map<unsigned short, std::string> types = util::getTypeMap( false, true );
00059         // remove some types which are useless as representation
00060         // "(unsigned short)" is needed because otherwise erase would take the reference of a static constant which is only there during compile time
00061         types.erase( ( unsigned short )data::TypePtr<util::Selection>::staticID );
00062         types.erase( ( unsigned short )data::TypePtr<std::string>::staticID );
00063         types.erase( ( unsigned short )data::TypePtr<boost::posix_time::ptime>::staticID );
00064         types.erase( ( unsigned short )data::TypePtr<boost::gregorian::date>::staticID );
00065         types.erase( ( unsigned short )data::TypePtr<util::ilist>::staticID );
00066         types.erase( ( unsigned short )data::TypePtr<util::dlist>::staticID );
00067         types.erase( ( unsigned short )data::TypePtr<util::slist>::staticID );
00068 
00069         for( std::map<unsigned short, std::string>::iterator i = types.begin(); i != types.end(); i++ ) {
00070             i->second.resize( i->second.find_last_not_of( '*' ) + 1 );
00071         }
00072 
00073         parameters["repn"] = util::Selection( types );
00074         parameters["repn"].needed() = false;
00075         parameters["repn"].setDescription(
00076             "Representation in which the data shall be written." );
00077     }
00078 
00079     if( have_input || have_output ) {
00080         parameters["np"] = false;
00081         parameters["np"].needed() = false;
00082         parameters["np"].setDescription( "suppress progress bar" );
00083         parameters["np"].hidden() = true;
00084     }
00085 }
00086 
00087 IOApplication::~IOApplication()
00088 {
00089     data::IOFactory::setProgressFeedback( 0 );
00090 }
00091 
00092 bool IOApplication::init( int argc, char **argv, bool exitOnError )
00093 {
00094     if ( ! util::Application::init( argc, argv, exitOnError ) )
00095         return false;
00096 
00097     if ( m_input ) {
00098         return autoload( exitOnError );
00099     }
00100 
00101     return true;
00102 }
00103 void IOApplication::printHelp( bool withHidden ) const
00104 {
00105     util::Application::printHelp( withHidden );
00106 
00107     if( withHidden ) {
00108         std::cout << std::endl << "Available IO Plugins:" << std::endl;
00109         data::IOFactory::FileFormatList plugins = data::IOFactory::getFormats();
00110         BOOST_FOREACH( data::IOFactory::FileFormatList::const_reference pi, plugins ) {
00111             std::cout << std::endl << "\t" << pi->name() << std::endl << "\t=======================================" << std::endl;
00112             const std::list<util::istring> suff = pi->getSuffixes();
00113             const std::list<std::string> dialects = util::string2list<std::string>( pi->dialects( "" ) );
00114             std::cout << "\tsupported suffixes: " << util::list2string( suff.begin(), suff.end(), "\", \"", "\"", "\"" )  << std::endl;
00115 
00116             if( !dialects.empty() )
00117                 std::cout << "\tsupported dialects: " << util::list2string( dialects.begin(), dialects.end(), "\", \"", "\"", "\"" )  << std::endl;
00118         }
00119     }
00120 }
00121 
00122 bool IOApplication::autoload( bool exitOnError )
00123 {
00124     std::string input = parameters["in"];
00125     std::string rf = parameters["rf"];
00126     std::string dl = parameters["rdialect"];
00127     bool no_progress = parameters["np"];
00128     LOG( Runtime, info )
00129             << "loading " << util::MSubject( input )
00130             << ( rf.empty() ? "" : std::string( " using the format: " ) + rf )
00131             << ( ( !rf.empty() && !dl.empty() ) ? " and" : "" )
00132             << ( dl.empty() ? "" : std::string( " using the dialect: " ) + dl );
00133 
00134     if( !no_progress ) {
00135         data::IOFactory::setProgressFeedback( &feedback );
00136     }
00137 
00138     images = data::IOFactory::load( input, rf, dl );
00139 
00140     if ( images.empty() ) {
00141         if ( exitOnError )
00142             exit( 1 );
00143         else
00144             return false;
00145     } else {
00146         for( ImageList::const_iterator a = images.begin(); a != images.end(); a++ ) {
00147             for( ImageList::const_iterator b = a; ( ++b ) != images.end(); ) {
00148                 const util::PropMap &aref = **a, bref = **b;
00149                 LOG_IF( aref.getDifference( bref ).empty(), Runtime, warning ) << "The metadata of the images from "
00150                         << aref.getProperty<std::string>( "source" ) << ":" << std::distance<ImageList::const_iterator>( images.begin(), a )
00151                         << " and " << bref.getProperty<std::string>( "source" ) << ":" << std::distance<ImageList::const_iterator>( images.begin(), b )
00152                         << " are equal. Maybe they are duplicates.";
00153             }
00154         }
00155     }
00156 
00157     return true;
00158 }
00159 
00160 bool IOApplication::autowrite( const Image &out_image, bool exitOnError )
00161 {
00162     ImageList list;
00163     list.push_back( boost::shared_ptr<Image>( new Image( out_image ) ) );
00164     return autowrite( list, exitOnError );
00165 }
00166 
00167 bool IOApplication::autowrite( const ImageList &out_images, bool exitOnError )
00168 {
00169     const util::Selection repn = parameters["repn"];
00170     const std::string output = parameters["out"];
00171     const std::string wf = parameters["wf"];
00172     const std::string dl = parameters["wdialect"];
00173     LOG( Runtime, info )
00174             << "Writing " << out_images.size() << " images"
00175             << ( repn ? std::string( " as " ) + ( std::string )repn : "" )
00176             << " to " << util::MSubject( output )
00177             << ( wf.empty() ? "" : std::string( " using the format: " ) + wf )
00178             << ( ( !wf.empty() && !dl.empty() ) ? " and" : "" )
00179             << ( dl.empty() ? "" : std::string( " using the dialect: " ) + dl );
00180 
00181     if( repn != 0 ) {
00182         BOOST_FOREACH( ImageList::const_reference ref, out_images ) {
00183             ref->makeOfTypeId( repn );
00184         }
00185     }
00186 
00187     data::IOFactory::setProgressFeedback( &feedback );
00188 
00189     if ( ! IOFactory::write( out_images, output, wf, dl ) ) {
00190         if ( exitOnError )
00191             exit( 1 );
00192 
00193         return false;
00194     } else
00195         return true;
00196 }
00197 
00198 Image IOApplication::fetchImage()
00199 {
00200     Image ret = *images.front();
00201     images.pop_front();
00202     return ret;
00203 }
